citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00am on
7/30/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by honking the vehicle horn, knocking on house door, calling
the phone number and leaving a message. An attempt to inspect was also made on July 29 at approximately 10:00 am.
There was no response to phone calls. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a
serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00am on 
7/30/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by honking the vehicle horn, knocking on house door, calling 
the phone number and leaving a message. An attempt to inspect was also made on July 29 at approximately 10:00 am. 
There was no response to phone calls. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a 
serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
